calculations.name: Starting CF from FWD
calculations.tableau_expression:
Sum(({FIXED   [RpDate],[Subs],[Cash curr],[Start date],[R/RR]: 
(
(Sum(IF [Is Forward Start ?] = 1 THEN ([Ut. US MM])*-1 ELSE 0 END)))}))
